snippet: Former test bowler Jason Gillespie will work as assistant to head coach Justin Langer for Australia's three Twenty20 internationals against Sri Lanka in February, Cricket Australia said on Thursday....
lead_paragraph: Former test bowler Jason Gillespie will work as assistant to head coach Justin Langer for Australia's three Twenty20 internationals against Sri Lanka in February, Cricket Australia said on Thursday.

headline.main: Gillespie Takes Up T20 Coaching Role for Australia
headline.print_headline: Gillespie Takes Up T20 Coaching Role for Australia
